meanings.sent1: She preelects her outfit for school the night before.
meanings.sent2: The team preelects their captain before the season starts.
meanings.sent3: He preelects his snacks for the movie night to avoid last-minute decisions.
meanings.sent4: The teacher preelects the group leaders like a chess master planning their moves.
meanings.sent5: Planning ahead, she preelects the songs for the road trip playlist.

meanings.definition: To elect or appoint in advance
meanings.sent1: The company preelects the new CEO before the current one retires.
meanings.sent2: They preelect the student council president a month before the elections.
meanings.sent3: The family preelects the vacation destination to surprise the kids.
meanings.sent4: The coach preelects the MVP of the game based on their performance in practice.
meanings.sent5: In a strategic move, she preelects her study group members for the project.
